verses.verse: Jehovah <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427>; let the peoples <WH5971> tremble <WH7264>: He sitteth <WH3427> above the cherubim <WH3742>; let the earth <WH776> be moved <WH5120>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is great <WH1419> in Zion <WH6726>; And he is high <WH7311> above all the peoples <WH5971>.
Let them praise <WH3034> thy great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> name <WH8034>: Holy is he <WH6918>.

The king <WH4428>'s strength <WH5797> also loveth <WH157> justice <WH4941>; Thou dost establish <WH3559> equity <WH4339>; Thou executest <WH6213> justice <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in Jacob <WH3290>.
Exalt <WH7311> ye Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, And worship <WH7812> at his footstool <WH7272>: Holy is he <WH6918>.

Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> among his priests <WH3548>, And Samuel <WH8050> among them that call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>; They called <WH7121> upon Jehovah <WH3068>, and he answered them <WH6030>.
He spake <WH1696> unto them in the pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051>: They kept <WH8104> his testimonies <WH5713>, And the statute <WH2706> that he gave them <WH5414>.
Thou answeredst <WH6030> them <WH3068>, O Jehovah our God <WH430>: Thou wast a God <WH410> that forgavest <WH5375> them <WH5358>, Though thou tookest vengeance of their doings <WH5949>.
Exalt <WH7311> ye Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, And worship <WH7812> at his holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>; For Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430> is holy <WH6918>.
